sites.title: ProtonVPN: The only free VPN with no ads and no speed limits
sites.desc: The ProtonVPN Free VPN service has no data limit, no advertisements, and a no-logs guarantee. Our free plan encrypts your Internet activity, protects your IP address, and lets you view censored content. ProtonVPN’s free plan is the only free VPN service that has no data limit, no advertisements and no logs of user activity. By using a VPN, you can keep your personal data private and secure.
